question: 大騒ぎ
sourceMnemonic: If <ja>騒ぐ</ja> is "to make noise," then a <kanji>big</kanji> version of this is even louder. It's a <vocabulary>clamor</vocabulary> and an <vocabulary>uproar</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is word that uses the kun'yomi readings of the kanji, which you should know already because <ja>大</ja> is pretty familiar to you by now (I hope) and you just learned <ja>騒ぐ</ja> as well! Put them together, with a little tweaking at the end, and you have your reading. Ta-da!
